snippet: While Boston’s Aaron Cook was solid, Yu Darvish allowed 11 hits in losing for the fourth time in his last five starts.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Boston Red Sox defeat the Texas Rangers, 9-2; other baseball scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: While Boston’s Aaron Cook was solid, Yu Darvish allowed 11 hits in losing for the fourth time in his last five starts.

headline.seo: Red Sox Rout Rangers After Owner Backs Valentine
headline.main: Red Sox Hit Eight Doubles in Defeating the Rangers
headline.print_headline: Red Sox Easily Beat Rangers After Owner Backs Valentine
